articles.title: Sunil Gavaskar passes verdict on Rohit Sharma's no-show against Australia in WC - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Sunil Gavaskar dissected the dismissal of Rohit Sharma after India's win over Australia in its World Cup opener. | Cricket
articles.content: Legendary Indian cricketer Sunil Gavaskar dissected the dismissal of Rohit Sharma after the batting failure of the veteran opener paved the way for India to script an unwanted record at the ICC World… [+2721 chars]
